metadata.synopsis: A small AD for one of the execution on-lookers for when situation haven't been interacted with yet.Will be playing alternately with other onlookers.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Approach the place of the situation at -229; 4; -160 in lower city, in the docks, near the steelwatch foundry.The dialog will be triggered from time to time before players engage in the situation.

1.speaker: Slorsha Grommer
1.text: Hang him! Hang him 'til he's dead!
